sections.heading: State v. Prieur; pretrial; burden of proofThe burden of proof in a pretrial hearing held in accordance with State v
sections.text: Prieur, 277 So.2d 126 (La. 1973), shall be identical to the burden of proof required by Federal Rules of Evidence Article IV, Rule 404.Acts 1994, 3rd Ex. Sess., No. 51, ยง2.
